text: I've been reading up on something called the 'Pomodoro Technique' lately!
./././'Pomodoro' is a fancy Italian word for sitting on your ass,/ instead of doing any actual work.
Ah,/ I do that already!/ I didn't someone had coined a name for it.

opinion0.text: Oh,/ lighten up #player#./ Sounds like someone needs a Pomodoro.

opinion1.text: Oh, lighten up #player#./ Sounds like someone needs a Pomodoro.

opinion2.text: Sure!/ It's good to take a break once in awhile~

opinion3.text: Ha!/ Ha!/ Maybe we can compare notes some time.
